entry.title: [WW] Looking into buying a townhouse built by DR Horton. Anyone have experience with
entry.content:
Looking into buying a townhouse built by DR Horton. Anyone have experience with them, or tips in general for buying a first house? In particular I'm wondering whether I need a realtor to negotiate a deal with them to buy a townhouse under construction. With how busy I am, it's been difficult to find many resources for getting started with my first house.
The place costs \~$500k and I'm pretty much just buying it as an investment (though living there will be very nice compared to my current \~550 sqr ft apartment)
